title: Car Interior Sound Effects Pack
description: A set of 119 recordings of an interior of a premium car with a 2.0 diesel engine.
longDescription:
A set of 119 recordings of an interior of a premium car with a 2.0 diesel engine.


This pack includes sounds of driving from various perspectives as well as interior controls, amenities and safety features.

technicalDetails:
Features: 119 stereo .wav sound effects.


Number of Audio Waves: 119

Number of Audio Cues: 119

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 5:27

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
